name: Shared Square
description:
A co-op experience of a couple's therapy session that goes beyond the limits. The journey you are going through makes you make decision (some are tough and some are not) and co-operate with each other in a way that reflects your relationship.

This is a recommended experience for all couples or other people with difficulty in making joint decisions. Use it as a platform to talk these things out and to find your way to settle and compromise.
